english.segment1: Wherever you are tonight girl. I'll see you in my dreams. Wherever I go tomorrow. You'll be here next to me
english.segment2: And though we are a world apart. I know you'll never be that far
english.segment3: Chorus: 'Cause here in my heart. There's a picture of us. Together forever. Unfaded and unbroken. Wherever you are. Your love covers me. Forever more you'll be. Here in my heart
english.segment4: Whenever I miss you so much. It's more than I can bear. I won't cry, I'll just close my eyes. And know you'll be there
english.segment5: Your kiss and your touch. I'll never forget. 'Cause you're as close. As my very next breath
